Package it.unipd.dei.se.parse

Class TipsterParser

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.se.parse.DocumentParser
it.unipd.dei.se.parse.TipsterParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<ParsedDocument>, Iterator<ParsedDocument>
public class TipsterParser extends DocumentParser
Provides a very basic parser for the TIPSTER corpus (FBIS, FR, FT, LATIMES), i.e. TREC Disks 4 and 5 minus Congressional Record.

It is based on the parser TrecDocIterator.java by Ian Soboroff.

Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Nicola Ferro
